name: Lost Dawn
description:
Lost Dawn is a Japanese style role-playing game set in the world of Midtera, a magic land which risks descending into a never-ending obscurity because of an entity called Darkness. The Darkness has been enveloping Midtera's world from a hundred years and continues spreading where the rays of sun still shine, eating light.

Only the magical power of the Light Sources manages to keep the Darkness away, discouraging the creatures that live within it, the Obscurus. These creatures are born in the Darkness and take stregth and vigour from it.

Nine heroes, almost accidentally reunited will fight to save Midtera, confronting the Obscurus and trying to unveil the secret that envelops the Darkness.

The game is a early version of Demo for this reason there could be more or less serious problems. We ask you to be understanding and to write to us in our personal email or in the comments section any bugs, glitches or other useful feedbacks to improve the game.

Thank you all for the trust you have placed in us.
